snippet: The Dallas Mavericks have made a move at small forward, with restricted free agent Chandler Parsons signing a three-year offer sheet worth more than $45 million....

headline.print_headline: Parsons Signs 3-Year Offer Sheet With Mavericks
headline.main: Parsons Signs 3-Year Offer Sheet With Mavericks

lead_paragraph: The Dallas Mavericks have made a move at small forward, with restricted free agent Chandler Parsons signing a three-year offer sheet worth more than $45 million.
